title: State plan for the development of intellectual disability services 1989-1992: a consumer's guide
creator_credit: Les Greenhill and CSV Community Services Victoria, IDS Public Education Unit
brief_description: A consumer’s overview of the State Plan for the development of Intellectual Disability Services which aims to help intellectually disabled people make decisions about their future regarding accomodation, employment, education, family support, recreation, rights and respite care. Discusses funding, changes in institutional care, assistance provided by the Community Living Support Service and the role of public education.
